original_title: Winnie the Pooh The Most Famous Bear in the World
overview: Alan Titchmarsh celebrates the 90th birthday of Winnie-the-Pooh, the world's most famous bear. Alan travels to Cotchford Farm in Sussex and the Hundred Acre Wood to see the locations that inspired the A A Milne's poems and books.
title: Winnie the Pooh The Most Famous Bear in the World
